meanings.sent1: The tiny sprite danced gracefully in the moonlight.
meanings.sent2: I read a story about a mischievous sprite who played tricks on villagers.

meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like the tinkling of bells, a true sprite of joy.

meanings.definition: A computer graphic that may be moved on-screen and otherwise manipulated as a single entity
meanings.sent1: The game developer created a sprite of a hero character for the players to control.
meanings.sent2: The sprite of a bouncing ball moved smoothly across the screen.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous sprite on the screen seemed to have a mind of its own, dodging obstacles.
meanings.sent4: The sprite of a flame flickered and danced, casting a warm glow on the digital world.
meanings.sent5: With a click of the mouse, the sprite transformed into a fierce dragon, ready for battle.
